title: Summer seafood feast
text:
[Photo provided to chinadaily.com.cn]

All you can eat Alaskan king crab, Boston lobster and salmon of the highest quality is available every Friday night in a special summer offer at Seasonal Tastes restaurant of Westin Beijing Chaoyang.

Guest can have abalone, clam, swimming crab and mantis shrimp fried on site with a special spicy sauce, or simply enjoy them baked, boiled or steamed.

Apart from seafood, guests can enjoy a wide range of cuisines from home and abroad, as well as plenty of desserts and ice cream.

Open cooking stations offer noodles, dim sum, teppanyaki, Indian favorites, carving stations and more. An “around-the-pillar” buffet offers colorful salads, kebabs, Chinese specialties, and luscious desserts.

The seafood buffet is available at dinner time and priced at 438 yuan ($64)/person on Fridays.

Seasonal Tastes, The Westin Beijing Chaoyang, 7 East Third Ring North Road, Chaoyang district, Beijing (010 - 5922 8888)
